about_the_game:
Learn to play chess with Chess Tools, no matter if you're a complete beginner or an intermediate.

Tutorials

With over 70 tutorials about the rules, tactics, openings, middlegames and endgames.

Tools

See attacked pieces, king attacks, possible king moves, hanging pieces, knights forks and many more things highlighted on the board.

Find the move

See the famous games of some of the games greatest players and in critical positions you need to find the move that they played. Includes 80 games at launch. You will also be shown possible variations and explanations of why moves were played.

Launch:

Games from Mikhail Tal, Bobby Fischer, Garry Kasparov and Anatoly Karpov.

Modern GM Update:

Games from Magnus Carlsen, Hikaru Nakamura, Vishy Anand and Fabiano Caruana.

Play against AI

Practice playing against an AI of different levels. You can also play different variations like chess 960 and duck chess!

Game Review

Import and review your games and see your mistakes in an analysis board!

Custom Engine

Play against external engines and use them to review your games
